Detailed Description

Windowing for anti-aliasing.

Class to perform windowing on an one dimentional digital signal. It's a technique to reduce aliasing effects. The Window class contains implementations for various filters such as Hamming ... etc

Definition at line 26 of file window.h.

Member Function Documentation

void Window::windowHamming ( short int *  insignal,
long  N,
long  startIndex,
short int *  outsignal 
)

Performs Hamming window filtering. windowHammingUpdateTable is to be called before windowHamming

insignal : pointer to input signal

N : order of the window filter

startIndex : starting index of the window relative to the input signal. Windowing done on startIndex to startIndex + N

outsignal : pointer to the filter output (should be of length N)

Generates the hamming window lookup table for fast filter operation

N : order of hamming window to be generated
